content: Please familiarize yourself with the below rules that apply throughout the entire duration of Prosperity. Happy Trading!
To ensure a smooth experience during Prosperity, here are a few important guidelines regarding team participation and solo play:
Create an Account → You can register and join the game anytime until the end of Round 5.
Join a New Team → Team formation is open until the end of Round 2.

Switch Teams → You can switch teams until the end of Round 2. Switching teams is done by receiving an invitation link from the new team’s admin. If you accept an invite to a new team, you will automatically resign from your current one.
Start a Solo Player Island → Prefer to go solo? You can start your own island anytime until the end of Round 5.
Please note that the Prosperity organization / admin board will not accommodate manually moving players from one team to the other at any point during the duration of the game.
To ensure Prosperity remains a respectful and enjoyable experience for everyone, we expect all participants to follow proper conduct on Discord and in the game.
Respect all participants – Keep discussions constructive and inclusive. Healthy competition is encouraged, but toxicity, harassment, or discrimination will not be tolerated.
Follow Discord rules & etiquette – No spamming, offensive language, or inappropriate behavior.

Moderation – Repeated violations will trigger warnings, temporary mutes, or bans. Failure to adhere to these rules may result in removal from the Discord server and potentially the game. Let’s create a positive environment for everyone! If you experience any issues, please contact a moderator.
